pageContext.claim: “In North Carolina, it took 25 years to begin construction of the Marc Basnight Bridge.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump cited delays in building a bridge to change the 50-year-old National Environmental Policy Act, but the Southern Environmental Law Center said the federal law was not responsible for delays. “No amount of streamlining would have eliminated the initial delays in the Bonner Bridge project, which were due entirely to an incomplete proposal, politics, and funding — not NEPA,” the non-profit law center wrote in August 2019 in comments to the federal Council on Environmental Quality.
